Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.filter

Filters include/exclude targets from a list of entities generated by an entity reference or a card source.

Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.desc.filter Description

Filters include/exclude targets from a list of entities generated by an entity reference or a card source.
See Also:
for more about filtering., for the way cards are generated., for the way a target is turned into multiple specific entities.
